bioconda.name: bioconductor-panr
bioconda.summary: Posterior association networks and functional modules inferred from rich phenotypes of gene perturbations

biotools.summary: This package provides S4 classes and methods for inferring functional gene networks with edges encoding posterior beliefs of gene association types and nodes encoding perturbation effects.

bioschemas.name: PANR
bioschemas.summary: This package provides S4 classes and methods for inferring functional gene networks with edges encoding posterior beliefs of gene association types and nodes encoding perturbation effects.
